locations.name: St Thomas Head
locations.description: An old MOD base used during the war to develop and test a range of explosives. Before being discontinued it was used for bomb disposal.

locations.name: The Field
locations.description: The field is located just off of a model aircraft flight area, a great spot for testing the drone for this application!

locations.name: The Farm
locations.description: The farm is located between St Thomas Head and the model aircraft field. No pointcloud data is available.

locations.name: Sea Wall
locations.description: The sea wall is located near to the shooting range, close to St Thomas Head. It is a location with no pointcloud.
